mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.title, a.price, a.lesson_num lessonNum, a.cover, c.title subjectLevelOne, e.title subjectLevelTwo, d.`name` teacherName FROM edu_course a LEFT JOIN edu_course_description b ON a.id = b.id LEFT JOIN edu_subject c ON a.subject_id = c.id LEFT JOIN edu_subject e ON a.subject_parent_id = e.id LEFT JOIN edu_teacher d ON a.teacher_id = d.id WHERE a.id = #{coursId}
